071public class MoneyCommand extends BaseCommand {
072
073  //ArgumentsParser: [currency]
074  public static void onMyBal(final CmdSource<?> sender) {
075
076    if(sender.player().isPresent()) {
077      sender.player().get().inventory().openMenu(sender.player().get(), "my_bal");
078    }
079  }
080
081  //ArgumentsParser: [currency] [world]
082  public static void onBalance(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Currency currencyParam, final String region) {
083
084    final Currency currency = (currencyParam == null)? TNECore.eco().currency().defaultCurrency() : currencyParam;
085
086    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
087    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
088      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.balance." + currency.getIdentifier())) {
089        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
090        data.addReplacement("$action", "balance check");
091        data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getDisplay());
092        sender.message(data);
093        return;
094      }
095    }
096
097    if(sender.player().isPresent() && MainConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Core.Commands.GUIAlternatives", true)) {
098      sender.player().get().inventory().openMenu(sender.player().get(), "my_bal");
099      return;
100    }
101
102    final Optional<Account> account = BaseCommand.account(sender, "balance");
103    if(account.isEmpty()) {
104      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.General.NoPlayer");
105      data.addReplacement("$player", sender.name());
106      sender.message(data);
107      return;
108    }
109    onOther(sender, account.get(), currency, region);
110  }
111
112  //ArgumentsParser: <amount> <to currency> [from currency]
113  public static void onConvert(final CmdSource<?> sender, final PercentBigDecimal amount, final Currency currency, final Currency fromCurrency) {
114
115    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
116    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
117      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.convert.to." + currency.getIdentifier())) {
118        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
119        data.addReplacement("$action", "convert to");
120        data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getDisplay());
121        sender.message(data);
122        return;
123      }
124
125      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.convert.from." + fromCurrency.getIdentifier())) {
126        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
127        data.addReplacement("$action", "convert from");
128        data.addReplacement("$currency", fromCurrency.getDisplay());
129        sender.message(data);
130        return;
131      }
132    }
133
134    if(amount.value().compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) < 0) {
135      sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Money.Negative"));
136      return;
137    }
138
139    if(currency.getUid().equals(fromCurrency.getUid())) {
140      sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Money.ConvertSame"));
141      return;
142    }
143
144    final Optional<Account> account = BaseCommand.account(sender, "convert");
145    if(account.isEmpty()) {
146      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.General.NoPlayer");
147      data.addReplacement("$player", sender.name());
148      sender.message(data);
149      return;
150    }
151
152    final Optional<BigDecimal> converted = fromCurrency.convertValue(currency.getIdentifier(), amount.value());
153    if(converted.isEmpty()) {
154      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.NoConversion");
155      data.addReplacement("$converted", currency.getIdentifier());
156      sender.message(data);
157      return;
158    }
159
160    final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(BaseCommand.region(sender),
161                                                           currency.getUid(),
162                                                           converted.get().setScale(currency.getDecimalPlaces(), RoundingMode.DOWN)
163    );
164
165    final HoldingsModifier modifierFrom = new HoldingsModifier(BaseCommand.region(sender),
166                                                               fromCurrency.getUid(),
167                                                               amount.value().setScale(currency.getDecimalPlaces(), RoundingMode.DOWN).negate()
168    );
169
170    final UUID sourceID = (sender.identifier().isPresent())? sender.identifier().get() : TNECore.instance().getServerAccount();
171    final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("convert")
172            .from(account.get(), modifierFrom)
173            .to(account.get(), modifier)
174            .processor(EconomyManager.baseProcessor())
175            .source(new PlayerSource(sourceID));
176
177    final Optional<Receipt> receipt = processTransaction(sender, transaction, account.get().getName(), amount.value());
178    if(receipt.isPresent()) {
179      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Converted");
180      data.addReplacement("$from_amount", amount.value().toPlainString());
181      data.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account.get(),
182                                                              modifierFrom.asEntry()));
183      sender.message(data);
184    }
185  }
186
187  //ArgumentsParser: <amount> [currency]
188  public static void onDeposit(final CmdSource<?> sender, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final Currency currencyParam, final String regionParam) {
189
190    parseMoney.normalizeParameters(currencyParam, regionParam);
191
192    String region = parseMoney.region();
193    final Currency currency = parseMoney.currency();
194
195    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
196    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
197      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.deposit." + currency.getIdentifier())) {
198        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
199        data.addReplacement("$action", "deposit");
200        data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getDisplay());
201        sender.message(data);
202        return;
203      }
204    }
205
206    if(player.isPresent() && region.equalsIgnoreCase("world-113")) {
207      region = player.get().world();
208    }
209
210    if(parseMoney.amount().compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) < 0) {
211      sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Money.Negative"));
212      return;
213    }
214
215    final Optional<Account> senderAccount = BaseCommand.account(sender, "deposit");
216
217    if(senderAccount.isEmpty()) {
218      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.General.NoPlayer");
219      data.addReplacement("$player", sender.name());
220      sender.message(data);
221      return;
222    }
223
224    region = TNECore.eco().region().resolve(region);
225
226    if(!(currency.type() instanceof MixedType)) {
227      sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Money.NotMixed"));
228      return;
229    }
230
231    final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(region,
232                                                           currency.getUid(),
233                                                           parseMoney.amount(),
234                                                           EconomyManager.VIRTUAL
235    );
236
237    final UUID sourceID = (sender.identifier().isPresent())? sender.identifier().get() : TNECore.instance().getServerAccount();
238    final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("deposit")
239            .to(senderAccount.get(), modifier)
240            .from(senderAccount.get(), modifier.counter(EconomyManager.ITEM_ONLY))
241            .processor(EconomyManager.baseProcessor())
242            .source(new PlayerSource(sourceID));
243
244    final Optional<Receipt> receipt = processTransaction(sender, transaction, senderAccount.get().getName(), parseMoney.amount());
245    if(receipt.isPresent()) {
246      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Deposit");
247      data.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(senderAccount.get(),
248                                                              modifier.asEntry()));
249      sender.message(data);
250    }
251  }
252
253  //ArgumentsParser: <player> <amount> [world] [currency]
254  public static void onGive(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Account account, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final Currency currency, final String region) {
255
256    parseMoney.normalizeParameters(currency, region);
257
258    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
259    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent() && !player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.give." + parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier())) {
260
261      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
262      data.addReplacement("$action", "give funds");
263      data.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getDisplay());
264      sender.message(data);
265      return;
266    }
267
268
269    final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(parseMoney.region(),
270                                                           parseMoney.currency().getUid(),
271                                                           parseMoney.amount());
272
273    final UUID sourceID = (sender.identifier().isPresent())? sender.identifier().get() : TNECore.instance().getServerAccount();
274    final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("give")
275            .to(account, modifier)
276            .source(new PlayerSource(sourceID));
277
278    final Optional<Receipt> receipt = processTransaction(sender, transaction, account.getName(), parseMoney.amount());
279    if(receipt.isPresent()) {
280      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Gave");
281      data.addReplacement("$player", account.getName());
282      data.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier());
283      data.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account,
284                                                              modifier.asEntry()));
285      sender.message(data);
286
287      final MessageData msgData = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Given");
288      msgData.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier());
289      msgData.addReplacement("$player", (sender.name() == null)? MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Server.Account.Name") : sender.name());
290      msgData.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, modifier.asEntry()));
291
292      MessageHandler.send(account.getIdentifier(), msgData.grab(account.getIdentifier()));
293      if(account.isPlayer() && ((PlayerAccount)account).isOnline()) {
294
295        final Optional<PlayerProvider> provider = ((PlayerAccount)account).getPlayer();
296
297        provider.ifPresent(playerProvider->playerProvider.message(msgData));
298      }
299    }
300  }
301
302  //ArgumentsParser: <amount> [world] [currency]
303  public static void onGiveAll(final CmdSource<?> sender, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final Currency currencyParam, final String regionParam) {
304
305    parseMoney.normalizeParameters(currencyParam, regionParam);
306
307    final String region = TNECore.eco().region().resolve(parseMoney.region());
308    final Currency currency = parseMoney.currency();
309
310    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
311    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
312      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.give." + currency.getIdentifier())) {
313        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
314        data.addReplacement("$action", "give funds");
315        data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getDisplay());
316        sender.message(data);
317        return;
318      }
319    }
320
321    final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(region,
322                                                           currency.getUid(),
323                                                           parseMoney.amount());
324
325    final List<String> accounts = new ArrayList<>();
326
327    final UUID sourceID = (sender.identifier().isPresent())? sender.identifier().get() : TNECore.instance().getServerAccount();
328    for(final Account account : TNECore.eco().account().getAccounts().values()) {
329
330      final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("give")
331              .to(account, modifier)
332              .source(new PlayerSource(sourceID));
333
334      final Optional<Receipt> receipt = processTransaction(sender, transaction, account.getName(), parseMoney.amount());
335      if(receipt.isPresent()) {
336
337        accounts.add(account.getName());
338
339        final MessageData msgData = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Given");
340        msgData.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getIdentifier());
341        msgData.addReplacement("$player", (sender.name() == null)? MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Server.Account.Name") : sender.name());
342        msgData.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, modifier.asEntry()));
343
344        MessageHandler.send(account.getIdentifier(), msgData.grab(account.getIdentifier()));
345        if(account.isPlayer() && ((PlayerAccount)account).isOnline()) {
346
347          final Optional<PlayerProvider> provider = ((PlayerAccount)account).getPlayer();
348
349          provider.ifPresent(playerProvider->playerProvider.message(msgData));
350        }
351      }
352    }
353
354    final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Gave");
355    data.addReplacement("$player", String.join(", ", accounts));
356    data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getIdentifier());
357    data.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(null, modifier.asEntry()));
358    sender.message(data);
359  }
360
361  public static void onGiveNote(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Account acc, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final Currency currency) {
362
363    parseMoney.normalizeParameters(currency, DEFAULT_WORLD);
364
365    final Optional<Note> note = parseMoney.currency().getNote();
366
367    final Optional<Account> accountOpt = BaseCommand.account(acc.getIdentifier(), "note");
368    final Account account = accountOpt.orElse(acc);
369    if(note.isPresent() && account instanceof final PlayerAccount player) {
370
371      final Optional<PlayerProvider> provider = player.getPlayer();
372
373      if(provider.isEmpty() || !player.isOnline()) {
374        sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Note.CreateOffline"));
375        return;
376      }
377
378      if(parseMoney.amount().compareTo(note.get().getMinimum()) < 0) {
379        final MessageData min = new MessageData("Messages.Note.Minimum");
380        min.addReplacement("$amount", note.get().getMinimum().toPlainString());
381        sender.message(min);
382        return;
383      }
384
385      final BigDecimal rounded = parseMoney.amount().setScale(parseMoney.currency().getDecimalPlaces(), RoundingMode.DOWN);
386
387      final Collection<AbstractItemStack<Object>> left = PluginCore.server().calculations().giveItems(Collections.singletonList(note.get().stack(parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier(), BaseCommand.region(sender), rounded)), provider.get().inventory().getInventory(false));
388
389      final MessageData entryMSG = new MessageData("Messages.Note.Given");
390      entryMSG.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier());
391      entryMSG.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, rounded));
392      provider.get().message(entryMSG);
393
394      final MessageData senderMSG = new MessageData("Messages.Note.Created");
395      senderMSG.addReplacement("$player", provider.get().getName());
396      senderMSG.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier());
397      senderMSG.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, rounded));
398      sender.message(senderMSG);
399
400      if(!left.isEmpty()) {
401        PluginCore.server().calculations().drop(left, player.getUUID(), true);
402        provider.get().message(new MessageData("Messages.Note.Dropped"));
403      }
404      return;
405    }
406    sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Note.CreateOffline"));
407  }
408
409  //ArgumentsParser: <amount> [currency]
410  public static void onNote(final CmdSource<?> sender, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final Currency currency) {
411
412    parseMoney.normalizeParameters(currency, DEFAULT_WORLD);
413
414    final Optional<Account> account = BaseCommand.account(sender, "note");
415    final Optional<Note> note = parseMoney.currency().getNote();
416    if(account.isPresent() && note.isPresent() && account.get() instanceof final PlayerAccount player) {
417
418      final Optional<PlayerProvider> provider = player.getPlayer();
419      if(provider.isEmpty()) {
420        return;
421      }
422
423      if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && !provider.get().hasPermission("tne.money.note." + parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier())) {
424        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
425        data.addReplacement("$action", "note");
426        data.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getDisplay());
427        sender.message(data);
428        return;
429      }
430
431      if(parseMoney.amount().compareTo(note.get().getMinimum()) < 0) {
432        final MessageData min = new MessageData("Messages.Note.Minimum");
433        min.addReplacement("$amount", note.get().getMinimum().toPlainString());
434        sender.message(min);
435        return;
436      }
437
438      final BigDecimal rounded = parseMoney.amount().setScale(parseMoney.currency().getDecimalPlaces(), RoundingMode.DOWN);
439
440      final BigDecimal amt = rounded.add(note.get().getFee().calculateTax(rounded)).setScale(parseMoney.currency().getDecimalPlaces(), RoundingMode.DOWN);
441
442      final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(BaseCommand.region(sender),
443                                                             parseMoney.currency().getUid(),
444                                                             amt
445      );
446
447      final UUID sourceID = (sender.identifier().isPresent())? sender.identifier().get() : TNECore.instance().getServerAccount();
448      final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("note")
449              .from(account.get(), modifier.counter())
450              .processor(EconomyManager.baseProcessor())
451              .source(new PlayerSource(sourceID));
452
453
454      final Optional<Receipt> receipt = processTransaction(sender, transaction, account.get().getName(), parseMoney.amount());
455      if(receipt.isPresent()) {
456        final Collection<AbstractItemStack<Object>> left = PluginCore.server().calculations().giveItems(Collections.singletonList(note.get().stack(parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier(), BaseCommand.region(sender), rounded)), provider.get().inventory().getInventory(false));
457
458        final MessageData entryMSG = new MessageData("Messages.Note.Given");
459        entryMSG.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier());
460        entryMSG.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account.get(), modifier.asEntry()));
461        sender.message(entryMSG);
462
463        if(!left.isEmpty()) {
464          PluginCore.server().calculations().drop(left, ((PlayerAccount)account.get()).getUUID(), true);
465          sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Note.Dropped"));
466        }
467      }
468    }
469  }
470
471  //ArgumentsParser: <player> [world] [currency]
472  public static void onOther(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Account account, final Currency currencyParam, String region) {
473
474    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
475    final Optional<UUID> senderID = sender.identifier();
476
477    final boolean other = (senderID.isPresent() && !senderID.get().equals(account.getIdentifier()));
478
479    final Currency currency = (currencyParam == null)? TNECore.eco().currency().defaultCurrency() : currencyParam;
480
481    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent() && other) {
482      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.other." + currency.getIdentifier())) {
483        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
484        data.addReplacement("$action", "balance check other");
485        data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getDisplay());
486        sender.message(data);
487        return;
488      }
489    }
490
491    if(player.isPresent() && region.equalsIgnoreCase("world-113")) {
492      region = player.get().world();
493    }
494
495    region = TNECore.eco().region().resolve(region);
496
497    final String resolve = region;
498
499    if(TNECore.eco().region().getDisabledRegions().contains(resolve)) {
500
501      final MessageData regionMSG = new MessageData("Messages.General.Disabled");
502      sender.message(regionMSG);
503      return;
504    }
505
506    final String header = (other)? "Messages.Money.HoldingsMultiOther" : "Messages.Money.HoldingsMulti";
507
508    final MessageData msg = new MessageData(header);
509    msg.addReplacement("$world", MISCUtils.worldFormatted(region));
510    msg.addReplacement("$player", account.getName());
511    sender.message(msg);
512
513    TNECore.eco().currency().currencies().forEach((cur)->{
514      if(cur.isBalanceShow()) {
515        printBalance(sender, account, cur, resolve);
516      }
517    });
518  }
519
520  public static void printBalance(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Account account, final Currency currency, final String region) {
521
522    final MessageData entryMSG = new MessageData("Messages.Money.HoldingsMultiSingle");
523    entryMSG.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getIdentifier());
524
525    BigDecimal amount = BigDecimal.ZERO;
526    for(final HoldingsEntry entry : currency.type().getHoldings(account, region, currency, EconomyManager.NORMAL)) {
527      amount = amount.add(entry.getAmount());
528
529      if(entry.getHandler().asID().equalsIgnoreCase(EconomyManager.INVENTORY_ONLY.asID())) {
530        if(currency.type().supportsItems()) {
531          entryMSG.addReplacement("$inventory", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, entry));
532        } else {
533          entryMSG.addReplacement("$inventory", "0");
534        }
535      }
536
537      if(entry.getHandler().asID().equalsIgnoreCase(EconomyManager.E_CHEST.asID())) {
538        if(currency.type().supportsItems()) {
539          entryMSG.addReplacement("$ender", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, entry));
540        } else {
541          entryMSG.addReplacement("$ender", "0");
542        }
543      }
544
545      if(entry.getHandler().asID().equalsIgnoreCase(EconomyManager.VIRTUAL.asID())) {
546        entryMSG.addReplacement("$virtual", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, entry));
547      }
548    }
549    entryMSG.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, new HoldingsEntry(region, currency.getUid(), amount, EconomyManager.NORMAL)));
550    sender.message(entryMSG);
551  }
552
553  //ArgumentsParser: <player> <amount> [currency] [from:account]
554  public static void onPay(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Account acc, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final Currency currency) {
555
556    parseMoney.normalizeParameters(currency, DEFAULT_WORLD);
557
558    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
559    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
560      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.pay." + parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier())) {
561        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
562        data.addReplacement("$action", "pay");
563        data.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getDisplay());
564        sender.message(data);
565        return;
566      }
567    }
568
569    if(parseMoney.amount().compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) < 0) {
570      sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Money.Negative"));
571      return;
572    }
573
574    final Optional<Account> senderAccount = BaseCommand.account(sender, "pay");
575
576    final Optional<Account> accountOpt = BaseCommand.account(acc.getIdentifier(), "payreceive");
577    final Account account = accountOpt.orElse(acc);
578
579    if(senderAccount.isEmpty()) {
580      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.General.NoPlayer");
581      data.addReplacement("$player", sender.name());
582      sender.message(data);
583      return;
584    }
585
586    if(senderAccount.get().getIdentifier().equals(account.getIdentifier())) {
587      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.SelfPay");
588      data.addReplacement("$player", sender.name());
589      sender.message(data);
590      return;
591    }
592
593    if(!MainConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Core.Commands.Pay.Offline", true)) {
594      if(!(account instanceof PlayerAccount) || !((PlayerAccount)account).isOnline()) {
595
596        sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Money.PayFailedOnline"));
597        return;
598      }
599    }
600
601    if(MainConfig.yaml().getInt("Core.Commands.Pay.Radius", 0) > 0) {
602      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.PayFailedDistance");
603      data.addReplacement("$distance", String.valueOf(MainConfig.yaml().getInt("Core.Commands.Pay.Radius")));
604
605      if(!(senderAccount.get() instanceof PlayerAccount) || !((PlayerAccount)senderAccount.get()).isOnline()
606         || !(account instanceof PlayerAccount) || !((PlayerAccount)account).isOnline()) {
607        sender.message(data);
608        return;
609      }
610
611      final Optional<PlayerProvider> senderPlayer = ((PlayerAccount)senderAccount.get()).getPlayer();
612      final Optional<PlayerProvider> playerPlayer = ((PlayerAccount)account).getPlayer();
613      if(senderPlayer.isEmpty() || playerPlayer.isEmpty()
614         || senderPlayer.get().getLocation().isEmpty() || playerPlayer.get().getLocation().isEmpty()) {
615        sender.message(data);
616        return;
617      }
618
619      if(senderPlayer.get().getLocation().get().distance(playerPlayer.get().getLocation().get()) > MainConfig.yaml().getInt("Core.Commands.Pay.Radius")) {
620        sender.message(data);
621        return;
622      }
623    }
624
625    final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(BaseCommand.region(sender),
626                                                           parseMoney.currency().getUid(),
627                                                           parseMoney.amount()
628    );
629
630    final UUID sourceID = (sender.identifier().isPresent())? sender.identifier().get() : TNECore.instance().getServerAccount();
631    final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("pay")
632            .to(account, modifier)
633            .from(senderAccount.get(), modifier.counter())
634            .processor(EconomyManager.baseProcessor())
635            .source(new PlayerSource(sourceID));
636
637    final Optional<Receipt> receipt = processTransaction(sender, transaction, account.getName(), parseMoney.amount());
638    if(receipt.isPresent()) {
639      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Paid");
640      data.addReplacement("$player", account.getName());
641      data.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier());
642      data.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account,
643                                                              modifier.asEntry()));
644      sender.message(data);
645
646      final MessageData msgData = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Received");
647      msgData.addReplacement("$player", (sender.name() == null)? MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Server.Account.Name") : sender.name());
648      msgData.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, modifier.asEntry()));
649      MessageHandler.send(account.getIdentifier(), msgData.grab(account.getIdentifier()));
650
651      if(account.isPlayer() && ((PlayerAccount)account).isOnline()) {
652
653        final Optional<PlayerProvider> provider = PluginCore.server().findPlayer(((PlayerAccount)account).getUUID());
654        provider.ifPresent(playerProvider->playerProvider.message(msgData));
655      }
656    }
657  }
658
659  //ArgumentsParser: <player> <amount> [currency]
660  public static void onRequest(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Account account, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final Currency currency) {
661
662    parseMoney.normalizeParameters(currency, DEFAULT_WORLD);
663
664    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
665    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
666      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.request." + parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier())) {
667        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
668        data.addReplacement("$action", "request funds");
669        data.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getDisplay());
670        sender.message(data);
671        return;
672      }
673    }
674
675    if(parseMoney.amount().compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) < 0) {
676      sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Money.Negative"));
677      return;
678    }
679
680    final Optional<PlayerProvider> provider = PluginCore.server().findPlayer(((PlayerAccount)account).getUUID());
681    if(provider.isEmpty()) {
682      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.General.NoPlayer");
683      data.addReplacement("$player", account.getName());
684      sender.message(data);
685      return;
686    }
687
688    final MessageData msg = new MessageData("Messages.Money.RequestSender");
689    msg.addReplacement("$player", account.getName());
690    msg.addReplacement("$amount", parseMoney.amount().toPlainString());
691    sender.message(msg);
692
693    final MessageData request = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Request");
694    request.addReplacement("$player", sender.name());
695    request.addReplacement("$amount", parseMoney.amount().toPlainString());
696    request.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier());
697    provider.get().message(request);
698  }
699
700  //ArgumentsParser: <player> <amount> [world] [currency]
701  public static void onSet(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Account account, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final Currency currencyParam, final String regionParam) {
702
703    parseMoney.normalizeParameters(currencyParam, regionParam);
704
705    String region = parseMoney.region();
706    final Currency currency = parseMoney.currency();
707
708    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
709    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
710      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.set." + currency.getIdentifier())) {
711        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
712        data.addReplacement("$action", "set funds");
713        data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getDisplay());
714        sender.message(data);
715        return;
716      }
717    }
718
719    if(player.isPresent() && region.equalsIgnoreCase("world-113")) {
720      region = player.get().world();
721    }
722
723    region = TNECore.eco().region().resolve(region);
724
725    final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(region,
726                                                           currency.getUid(),
727                                                           parseMoney.amount().setScale(currency.getDecimalPlaces(), RoundingMode.DOWN),
728                                                           HoldingsOperation.SET);
729
730    final UUID sourceID = (sender.identifier().isPresent())? sender.identifier().get() : TNECore.instance().getServerAccount();
731    final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("set")
732            .to(account, modifier)
733            .processor(EconomyManager.baseProcessor())
734            .source(new PlayerSource(sourceID));
735
736    final Optional<Receipt> receipt = processTransaction(sender, transaction, account.getName(), parseMoney.amount());
737
738    if(receipt.isPresent()) {
739      final MessageData msg = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Set");
740      msg.addReplacement("$player", account.getName());
741      msg.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getIdentifier());
742      msg.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account,
743                                                             modifier.asEntry())
744                        );
745      sender.message(msg);
746    }
747  }
748
749  //ArgumentsParser: <amount> [world] [currency]
750  public static void onSetAll(final CmdSource<?> sender, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final Currency currencyParam, final String regionParam) {
751
752    parseMoney.normalizeParameters(currencyParam, regionParam);
753
754    String region = parseMoney.region();
755    final Currency currency = parseMoney.currency();
756
757    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
758    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
759      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.setall." + currency.getIdentifier())) {
760        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
761        data.addReplacement("$action", "set all funds");
762        data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getDisplay());
763        sender.message(data);
764        return;
765      }
766    }
767
768    if(player.isPresent() && region.equalsIgnoreCase("world-113")) {
769      region = player.get().world();
770    }
771
772    region = TNECore.eco().region().resolve(region);
773
774    final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(region,
775                                                           currency.getUid(),
776                                                           parseMoney.amount().setScale(currency.getDecimalPlaces(), RoundingMode.DOWN),
777                                                           HoldingsOperation.SET);
778
779    final UUID sourceID = (sender.identifier().isPresent())? sender.identifier().get() : TNECore.instance().getServerAccount();
780    for(final Account account : TNECore.eco().account().getAccounts().values()) {
781      final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("set")
782              .to(account, modifier)
783              .processor(EconomyManager.baseProcessor())
784              .source(new PlayerSource(sourceID));
785
786      final Optional<Receipt> receipt = processTransaction(sender, transaction, account.getName(), parseMoney.amount());
787
788      if(receipt.isPresent()) {
789        final MessageData msg = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Set");
790        msg.addReplacement("$player", account.getName());
791        msg.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getIdentifier());
792        msg.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account,
793                                                               modifier.asEntry())
794                          );
795
796        msg.addReplacements(new String[]{
797                ""
798        }, new String[]{
799
800        });
801        sender.message(msg);
802        return;
803      }
804    }
805  }
806
807  public static void onSwitch(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Account account) {
808
809    if(account instanceof final SharedAccount shared) {
810
811      if(sender.identifier().isEmpty()) {
812
813        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.SwitchedFailed");
814        data.addReplacement("$account", account.getName());
815        sender.message(data);
816        return;
817      }
818
819      if(!shared.hasPermission(sender.identifier().get(), MemberPermissions.WITHDRAW)) {
820
821        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.SwitchedFailed");
822        data.addReplacement("$account", account.getName());
823        sender.message(data);
824        return;
825      }
826
827      doSwitch(sender.identifier().get(), account.getIdentifier());
828      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.Switched");
829      data.addReplacement("$account", account.getName());
830      sender.message(data);
831      return;
832    } else {
833      if(sender.identifier().isPresent() && sender.player().isPresent()) {
834
835        if(account.getIdentifier().equals(sender.identifier().get()) || sender.player().get().hasPermission("tne.money.switch.override")) {
836
837          doSwitch(sender.identifier().get(), account.getIdentifier());
838          final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.Switched");
839          data.addReplacement("$account", account.getName());
840          sender.message(data);
841          return;
842        }
843      }
844    }
845    final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.SwitchedFailed");
846    data.addReplacement("$account", account.getName());
847    sender.message(data);
848  }
849
850  //helper method for onSwitch
851  private static void doSwitch(final UUID account, final UUID swapAccount) {
852
853    if(swapAccount.equals(account)) {
854      TNECore.eco().account().removeSwap("balance", account);
855      TNECore.eco().account().removeSwap("convert", account);
856      TNECore.eco().account().removeSwap("deposit", account);
857      TNECore.eco().account().removeSwap("note", account);
858      TNECore.eco().account().removeSwap("pay", account);
859      TNECore.eco().account().removeSwap("payreceive", account);
860      TNECore.eco().account().removeSwap("withdraw", account);
861      return;
862    }
863    TNECore.eco().account().addSwap("balance", account, swapAccount);
864    TNECore.eco().account().addSwap("convert", account, swapAccount);
865    TNECore.eco().account().addSwap("deposit", account, swapAccount);
866    TNECore.eco().account().addSwap("note", account, swapAccount);
867    TNECore.eco().account().addSwap("pay", account, swapAccount);
868    TNECore.eco().account().addSwap("payreceive", account, swapAccount);
869    TNECore.eco().account().addSwap("withdraw", account, swapAccount);
870  }
871
872  //ArgumentsParser: <player> <amount> [world] [currency]
873  public static void onTake(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Account account, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final Currency currencyParam, final String regionParam) {
874
875    parseMoney.normalizeParameters(currencyParam, regionParam);
876
877    String region = parseMoney.region();
878    final Currency currency = parseMoney.currency();
879
880    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
881    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
882      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.take." + currency.getIdentifier())) {
883        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
884        data.addReplacement("$action", "take funds");
885        data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getDisplay());
886        sender.message(data);
887        return;
888      }
889    }
890
891    if(player.isPresent() && region.equalsIgnoreCase("world-113")) {
892      region = player.get().world();
893    }
894
895    region = TNECore.eco().region().resolve(region);
896
897
898    final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(region,
899                                                           currency.getUid(),
900                                                           parseMoney.amount()
901    );
902
903    final UUID sourceID = (sender.identifier().isPresent())? sender.identifier().get() : TNECore.instance().getServerAccount();
904    final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("take")
905            .to(account, modifier.counter())
906            .processor(EconomyManager.baseProcessor())
907            .source(new PlayerSource(sourceID));
908
909    final Optional<Receipt> receipt = processTransaction(sender, transaction, account.getName(), parseMoney.amount());
910    if(receipt.isPresent()) {
911      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Took");
912      data.addReplacement("$player", account.getName());
913      data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getIdentifier());
914      data.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account,
915                                                              modifier.asEntry()));
916      sender.message(data);
917
918      final MessageData msgData = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Taken");
919      msgData.addReplacement("$player", (sender.name() == null)? MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Server.Account.Name") : sender.name());
920      msgData.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getIdentifier());
921      msgData.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, modifier.asEntry()));
922      MessageHandler.send(account.getIdentifier(), msgData.grab(account.getIdentifier()));
923
924      if(account.isPlayer() && ((PlayerAccount)account).isOnline()) {
925
926        final Optional<PlayerProvider> provider = ((PlayerAccount)account).getPlayer();
927
928        provider.ifPresent(playerProvider->playerProvider.message(msgData));
929      }
930    }
931  }
932
933  //ArgumentsParser: [page] [currency:name] [world:world] [limit:#]
934  public static void onTop(final CmdSource<?> sender, Integer page, final Currency currency, final Boolean refresh) {
935
936    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
937    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
938      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.top." + currency.getIdentifier())) {
939        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
940        data.addReplacement("$action", "balance top");
941        data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getDisplay());
942        sender.message(data);
943        return;
944      }
945    }
946
947    final Optional<Account> senderAccount = BaseCommand.account(sender, "top");
948
949    if(senderAccount.isEmpty()) {
950      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.General.NoPlayer");
951      data.addReplacement("$player", sender.name());
952      sender.message(data);
953      return;
954    }
955
956    if(player.isPresent() && TNECore.eco().region().getDisabledRegions().contains(player.get().world())) {
957
958      final MessageData regionMSG = new MessageData("Messages.General.Disabled");
959      sender.message(regionMSG);
960      return;
961    }
962
963    if(refresh && !senderAccount.get().isPlayer() || refresh && senderAccount.get().isPlayer() && ((PlayerAccount)senderAccount.get()).getPlayer().isPresent()
964                                                     && ((PlayerAccount)senderAccount.get()).getPlayer().get().hasPermission("tne.money.top.refresh")) {
965
966      TopManager.instance().load();
967    }
968    final int max = TNECore.eco().getTopManager().page(currency.getUid());
969
970    if(page < 1) page = 1;
971    if(page > max) page = max;
972
973    final TopPage<String> pageEntry = TNECore.eco().getTopManager().page(page, currency.getUid());
974    if(pageEntry != null) {
975      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Top");
976      data.addReplacement("$page", String.valueOf(page));
977      data.addReplacement("$page_top", String.valueOf(max));
978      sender.message(data);
979
980      final int adjusted = (page - 1) * TOP_PER_PAGE;
981      int i = 1;
982      for(final Map.Entry<String, BigDecimal> entry : pageEntry.getValues().entrySet()) {
983        final MessageData en = new MessageData("Messages.Money.TopEntry");
984        en.addReplacement("$pos", (adjusted + i));
985        en.addReplacement("$player", entry.getKey());
986        en.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(senderAccount.get(), new HoldingsEntry(TNECore.eco().region().defaultRegion(), currency.getUid(), entry.getValue(), EconomyManager.NORMAL)));
987        sender.message(en);
988
989        i++;
990      }
991    }
992  }
993
994  //ArgumentsParser: <amount> [currency]
995  public static void onWithdraw(final CmdSource<?> sender, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final Currency currencyParam, final String regionParam) {
996
997    parseMoney.normalizeParameters(currencyParam, regionParam);
998
999    String region = parseMoney.region();
1000    final Currency currency = parseMoney.currency();
1001
1002    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
1003    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
1004      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.withdraw." + currency.getIdentifier())) {
1005        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
1006        data.addReplacement("$action", "withdraw funds");
1007        data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getDisplay());
1008        sender.message(data);
1009        return;
1010      }
1011    }
1012
1013    if(player.isPresent() && region.equalsIgnoreCase("world-113")) {
1014      region = player.get().world();
1015    }
1016
1017    if(parseMoney.amount().compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) < 0) {
1018      sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Money.Negative"));
1019      return;
1020    }
1021
1022    final Optional<Account> senderAccount = BaseCommand.account(sender, "withdraw");
1023    if(senderAccount.isEmpty()) {
1024      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.General.NoPlayer");
1025      data.addReplacement("$player", sender.name());
1026      sender.message(data);
1027      return;
1028    }
1029
1030    region = TNECore.eco().region().resolve(region);
1031
1032    if(!(currency.type() instanceof MixedType)) {
1033      sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Money.NotMixed"));
1034      return;
1035    }
1036
1037    final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(BaseCommand.region(sender),
1038                                                           currency.getUid(),
1039                                                           parseMoney.amount(),
1040                                                           EconomyManager.ITEM_ONLY
1041    );
1042
1043    final UUID sourceID = (sender.identifier().isPresent())? sender.identifier().get() : TNECore.instance().getServerAccount();
1044    final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("withdraw")
1045            .to(senderAccount.get(), modifier)
1046            .from(senderAccount.get(), modifier.counter(EconomyManager.VIRTUAL))
1047            .processor(EconomyManager.baseProcessor())
1048            .source(new PlayerSource(sourceID));
1049
1050    final Optional<Receipt> receipt = processTransaction(sender, transaction, senderAccount.get().getName(), parseMoney.amount());
1051    if(receipt.isPresent()) {
1052
1053      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Withdrawn");
1054      data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getIdentifier());
1055      data.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(senderAccount.get(),
1056                                                              modifier.asEntry()));
1057      sender.message(data);
1058    }
1059  }
1060
1061  public static Optional<Receipt> processTransaction(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Transaction transaction, final String modifiedAccount, final BigDecimal modifier) {
1062
1063    try {
1064      final TransactionResult result = transaction.process();
1065
1066      if(!result.isSuccessful()) {
1067        final MessageData data = new MessageData(result.getMessage());
1068        data.addReplacement("$player", modifiedAccount);
1069        data.addReplacement("$amount", modifier.toPlainString());
1070
1071        sender.message(data);
1072        return Optional.empty();
1073      }
1074
1075      return result.getReceipt();
1076    } catch(final InvalidTransactionException e) {
1077      e.printStackTrace();
1078    }
1079    return Optional.empty();
1080  }
1081}
